mapper.update: UPDATE terminals SET merchant_id = #{merchantId},billing_cycles_id = #{billingCyclesId} where id=#{terminalId}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(t.id,'') as id,IFNULL(t.customer_id,0) as terCustomerId,IFNULL(t.serial_num,'') as serial_num,IFNULL(t.status,'') as status, IFNULL(e.id,'') as appid, IFNULL(e.status,'') as appstatus,IFNULL(g.model_number,'') as model_number,IFNULL(b.`name`,'') as brandName, IFNULL(c.`name`,'') as channelName,IFNULL(t.pay_channel_id,'0') as payChannelId FROM terminals t LEFT JOIN opening_applies e ON e.terminal_id = t.id LEFT JOIN order_goods o on o.order_id = t.order_id and o.good_id = t.good_id LEFT JOIN goods g on o.good_id=g.id LEFT JOIN good_brands b on g.good_brands_id=b.id LEFT JOIN pay_channels c on c.id=t.pay_channel_id WHERE (t.agent_id in(select a.id from agents a where a.`code` LIKE (select CONCAT(z.`code`,'%') from agents z where z.id = #{id} ))) AND t.status in (#{twoStatus},#{threeStatus}) LIMIT #{offSetPage},#{pageSize}

SELECT count(*) FROM terminals t LEFT JOIN opening_applies e ON e.terminal_id = t.id LEFT JOIN order_goods o on o.order_id = t.order_id and o.good_id = t.good_id LEFT JOIN goods g on o.good_id=g.id LEFT JOIN good_brands b on g.good_brands_id=b.id LEFT JOIN pay_channels c on c.id=t.pay_channel_id WHERE (t.agent_id in(select a.id from agents a where a.`code` LIKE (select CONCAT(z.`code`,'%') from agents z where z.id = #{id}))) AND t.status in (#{twoStatus},#{threeStatus})
select count(*) from opening_applies where terminal_id = #{terminalId}

SELECT count(*) FROM terminals t LEFT JOIN opening_applies e ON e.terminal_id = t.id LEFT JOIN order_goods o on o.order_id = t.order_id and o.good_id = t.good_id LEFT JOIN goods g on o.good_id=g.id LEFT JOIN good_brands b on g.good_brands_id=b.id LEFT JOIN pay_channels c on c.id=t.pay_channel_id WHERE (t.agent_id in(select a.id from agents a where a.`code` LIKE (select CONCAT(z.`code`,'%') from agents z where z.id = #{id}))) AND t.status in (#{twoStatus},#{threeStatus}) AND t.serial_num like '%${serialNum}%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM terminals WHERE id = #{id} and customer_id is NOT null

SELECT * FROM merchants WHERE title = #{merchantName} or phone = #{phone}

select dop.*, l.opening_requirements_id from dictionary_open_private_infos dop LEFT JOIN opening_requirement_lists l on dop.id=l.requirement_setting_id LEFT JOIN opening_requirements o ON o.id = l.opening_requirements_id left join terminals t on t.pay_channel_id = o.pay_channel_id where t.id=#{terminalsId} AND l.requirement_type=#{status} order by l.opening_requirements_id
